import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import "../App.css" import serImg from "../images/server_img.png" import { getPost } from '../redux/actions/actions' export default function Shop() { const [produit, setproduit]=useState("") const [prix ,setPrix]=useState("") const [file,setfile]=useState("") const tableProduits=[] const dispatch = useDispatch() const selectors=useSelector(state=> state.getUser) const handleSubmit=(e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const data= new FormData(); data.append(prix,prix) data.append(file,file) dispatch(getPost(data)) } return (

{selectors.entreprise}

Ajouter vos produits
setfile(e.target.files[0])} /> setPrix(e.target.value)}/>
) }
